## admiral host edit

interactively edit host

### Synopsis

interactively edit host by hostname (-n,--hostname) ip (--ip) or host id (--id)

```
admiral host edit [flags]
```

### Options

```
  -h, --help              help for edit
  -n, --hostname string   base hostname
      --id int            host id
      --ip string         host ip
```
